data.title: Whats The Best Game Of Pc Engine And Sega Cd
data.meta_description:
whats the best game of Pc Engine (turbo16) and Sega Cd
i played near all console, but these 2, only a very few times
i own a lot of classic console but not...
data.text:
whats the best game of Pc Engine (turbo16) and Sega Cd

i played near all console, but these 2, only a very few times

i own a lot of classic console but not these 2 consoles.

i want to know only the great games of any genre: platform, action,racing,puzzle...

i would be very happy to know it.

thanks a lot for answer, i appreciate it

note`: if you know any 32x great game, i would like to know it too

Sega CD games:

Snatcher - A good adventure game, one of the few games that I actually played through to completion. Definitely recommended.

Robo Aleste - A very difficult shooter, one of the best.

Lunar: The Silver Star - A good turn-based RPG.

Popful Mail - A nice action/RPG.

Sonic CD - Some would say its the best Sonic game, but I actually think its the worst... Worth checking out anyway.

Silpheed - A good arcade shooter that actually shows a bit of 3D rendering on the Sega CD. Quite Nice.

Oh, and 32x Games:

Knuckles Chaotix - An interesting platformer, I actually quite like it.

Space Harrier 32X - Probably one of the, if not the best fort of Sega's arcade classic.

renejr902 said:

whats the best game of Pc Engine (turbo16) and Sega Cd

i played near all console, but these 2, only a very few times

i own a lot of classic console but not these 2 consoles.

i want to know only the great games of any genre: platform, action,racing,puzzle...

i would be very happy to know it.

thanks a lot for answer, i appreciate it

note`: if you know any 32x great game, i would like to know it too

I would divide my tg-16 time with Parasol stars and a some Rainbow Islands

Snow bros for the genesis is great, so are the sonic games, Sonic CD for segacd.

Chris

sega cd:

dark wizard - good stategy rpg

final fight - in some ways better than the arcade game. definitely tons better than horrible snes port

heart of the alien - frustrating yet fun sequel to out of this world which is also included.

Keio's Flying Squadron - cute fun shmup

flink - fun platformer

bc racer - fun mario kart style game

eternal champions - enhance version of the genesis game. one of the few original console fighting games of the time

pc engine hu card:

air zonk - fun and crazy horizontal shooter

devil's crush - very fun pinball game that doesn't try to recreate actual pinball and so is a fun video game

download - pretty fun shump with hilarious engrish profanity when you lose.

galaga 90 - galaga made even more addicting

bonks adventure - first in a series of fun platformers

blazing lazers - excellent shmup

ninja spirit - probably as good as the shinobi games

splatterhouse - first in great horror movie inspired series

pc engine cd:

gate of thunder - excellent side scrolling shmup

castlevania dracula x - one of the best pure action castevania games

faussete - interesting side scroller with mechanic similar to bionic commando

gain ground - great port of thinking mans action game

sapphire - fun shmup with great graphics

valis I and IV - very fun side scrollers

spriggan - like the sega cd version (robo aleste) but even better

star parodia - fun and funny vertical shmup

I'm finding tons of great pc engine games

Add to the list of great TG-16 CD titles above "Lords of Thunder". I compared it to the Sega CD version and the TG-16 version blows it away. The music is better, the graphics are better and it has an intro the Sega version does not.

The Exile RPGs are good (although the first one doesn't work in the current version of Temper), Ys series was good.

I find the TG-16 games have "cleaner" graphics than most Genesis games which use alot of dither.

Other games not mentioned that I thought were good and you might like are:

TG-16/PC-E HuCard:

Overide (shooter)

Bloody Wolf (action/shooter)

Dungeon Explorer (action/rpg)

Bomberman 1 & 93

Neutopia I & II (great zelda style rpg series)

Twinbee (shooter)

Parodius (shooter)

Super Star Soldier (shooter)

Final Soldier (shooter)

Soldier Blade (shooter...imagine that)

Bonk 3 (also on SCD) (platform/adventure)

R-Type (shooter)

TG-16/PC-E CD/SCD:

all of these are in English:

Buster Bros (great arcade port)

Cosmic Fantasy 2 (rpg)

Beyond Shadowgate (great adventure game)

Cotton (shooter)

Dragon Slayer (fun Falcom RPG)

Dungeon Explorer II

Dynastic Hero (different port of Wonder Boy in Monster World but is agood action rpg)

Monster Lair (platform shooter)

Japanese:

Kiaidan 00 (Great mech shooter)

Pop n Magic (Parasol Stars type game)

Nexzr (great shooter)

Sylphia (yet another shooter but is good)

Fray (run&gun action adventure)

Sega CD:

Vay (rpg)

Shining Force CD (strategy rpg)

Android Assault (good shooter with a nice soundtrack)

Lunar Eternal Blue (rpg)

Panic! also called Switch! (crazy wacky point click/puzzle game)

Sol-Feace (shooter that I like. some don't but I do)

sorry for making a long list
